name: Weekly Planner | Notion Template
description: Stay organized and productive with the Notion Weekly Planner. This template is easy to navigate and customize to make you feel at home while planning your personal and business life. Includes slots for your daily tasks, goals, and notes; tracker for daily habits and mood; and a calendar.Template features:Daily to-do listCalendarGoalsNotesHabit & mood tracker
features: Daily to-do list; Habit & mood tracker
